attributes.action: More toilets in places that serve food.
attributes.additional_details:
More toilets in places that serve food, as more people are being diagnoes with irritable bowel illnesses.
It would be better if there were more sit down toilets planned for in new builds or renovations.
I worked for about a week at an architects and they allocate the number of toilets in a new build based on guidelines rather than the prospect of having more than one person with irritable bowel illnesses.
